title: The Zeppelin Deception: A Stoker and Holmes Book
description: Mina Holmes and Evaline Stoker return in their final–and most exciting–adventure together. Will the Ankh be brought to justice? What will happen now that we know Pix’s real identity? And what about Dylan? …And Grayling? And what is that strange and mysterious airship that flies over London?
author: Colleen Gleason
